Hotel Accomodations


Meeting rates for attendees of the ABRF 2009 meeting are available at the Marriott Memphis Downtown and the Crowne Plaza Memphis.  Both hotels are in easy walking distance of the Convention Center where the meeting will be held.  To make your hotel room reservation, contact the hotel of your choice using the information below.  Please be sure to mention that you are attending the ABRF meeting in order to receive the special group rate.

The special group rates are available until the reserved blocks of rooms are all taken or January 7, 2009, whichever comes first.  Please reserve early to guarantee availability at your preferred hotel!

Update: The hotels have extended their cut-off date to January 23rd, so be sure to make your reservation soon!

Crowne Plaza Memphis
300 North Second Street
Rates: $139 single/double/triple/quad
To reserve your room, call the hotel at (901) 525-1800

Marriott Memphis Downtown  (Sold out on Saturday night)
250 North Main Street
Rates: $149 single/double/triple/quad
To reserve your room, call the hotel at (901) 527-7300


 

Travel


The ABRF 2009 meeting will be held February 7-10, 2009, at the

Memphis Cook Convention Center
255 North Main
Memphis, TN 38103

The nearest airport is the Memphis International Airport.
